title: National Assembly to meet on November 5
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 03 (APP):President Asif Ali Zardari on Monday summoned the session of the National Assembly on Wednesday, November 5 at 5:00 p.m. in the Parliament House, Islamabad.

According to press release issued here by the National Assembly Secretariat, the President has convened the session in exercise of the powers conferred upon him under Clause (1) of Article 54 of the Constitution of the Islamic Republic of Pakistan.

The session commencing on 5th November is the 21st session of the current National Assembly.
